name: SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST (Aaron.Duran)
description: ‘SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST’ is a top down survival zombie game which has a simple art style yet fun and amazing gameplay; the game has creepy and scary sounds that give more excitement to the game. My game is all about a man named Madingo; he’s the last human being on earth who tries to survive day and night against a horde of zombies. The aim is to gun down and survive groups of zombies as long as you can. Ammo packs and Health packs are scattered around the map to help Madingo survive, it is not going to be easy but it is going to be fun.
